channel.title: Teaching *Coding* is raising Awareness of Coding Design
channel.description: Recent content on Teaching *Coding* is raising Awareness of Coding Design

item.title: About
item.description: Professor assistant at University of Orleans (France) Teaching Web services (Rest and SOAP) Design patterns Test and Quality in Softwares Crypto systems and security JEE (JSP/servlets and Struts) JFx Research fields System verification Rewriting techniques and their approximations This space is dedicated to the sharing of exercices, thoughts, experiments I have done with my students since 2008 in different fields of programming listed (but not exhaustively) above.
